data.title: Surname Kuhn @ Acta Croatica

data.text:
Surname Kuhn in modern Croatia

In Croatia, Kuhn families are generally Croats (from Virovitica area ), very rarely Germans (from Virovitica ). In the past century, relatively most of Croatian residents bearing this family name were born in Virovitica area and in Virovitica.

Prevalence

About 10 people with faimily name Kuhn live in Croatia today, in 6 households. There were 10 of them in the middle of the past century, and their number remains constant.

They are located in only five naselja i to in Zagreb (<5), Velika Gorica (<5), Sveti Juraj (<5), Virovitica (<5), and in Veliki Kozinac in Duga Resa area (<5).

Outside Croatia

Family name Kuhn (including: Kuehn , Kuchin , Kuthan , Kuchun , Kuchan , Kuchen , Kuchn , Kuthen and Kuhnn ) is present in 112 countries worldwide. The family name "Kuhn " is used by some 100000 people in Germany , about 90000 in the United States , and some 40000 people in Brazil. "Kuchn " is used by small number of people in the United States. "Kuehn " is used by some 10000 people in Germany , about 9000 in the United States , and some 500 people in Canada.

Mentions in sources

In the sources analysed in the project Acta Croatica so far, the name is mentioned over sixty times, the first time 1902 in source Hartmann's General List of Apartments in Zagreb.
